properties.areaDesc: Coastal waters from Savannah GA to Altamaha Sound GA out 20 nm ...including Grays Reef National Marine Sanctuary; Coastal waters from Edisto Beach SC to Savannah GA out 20 nm
properties.headline: Small Craft Advisory issued January 5 at 5:25AM EST until January 5 at 7:00AM EST by NWS Charleston SC
properties.description:
* WHAT...Northwest winds 15 to 20 kt with gusts up to 25 kt.

* WHERE...Edisto Beach to Savannah out 20 NM and Savannah to
Altamaha Sound out 20 NM.

* WHEN...Until 7 AM EST this morning.

* IMPACTS...Conditions will be hazardous to small craft.
properties.instruction:
Inexperienced mariners, especially those operating smaller
vessels, should avoid navigating in hazardous conditions.

NWSheadline: SMALL CRAFT ADVISORY IN EFFECT UNTIL 7 AM EST THIS MORNING... ...GALE WARNING IS CANCELLED
